title: Loan facility of US$ 300 million from China Development Bank Corporation to Finance the Improvement and Rehabilitation of Priority Road Project 3 (Phase I)
decision_details:
- the above project aims to rehabilitate about 270 km of priority road sections and the proposal made by H.E. the President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance and Planning, to include the under mentioned 04 road sections too under this project and to enter into a loan agreement to obtain a loan of US$ 300 million for the above project, was approved by the Cabinet:

* Narandeniya - Hakmana Road 	-   0.00 -11.95 km
* Ayagama - Egaloya Road		-   0.00 - 23 km
* Mawanella Hemmathagama Road -  0.00 - 26 km
* Hatton Maskeliya Dalhousie Road -  0.00 - 31.89 km
